title: How to Make a Note into an Envelope

steps.title: Take a piece of notebook paper
steps.content: Take a piece of notebook paper (any piece of paper) and write your note on the side that will be the interior of the envelope. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Rotate your piece of paper
steps.content: Rotate your piece of paper so that the beginning of the note is to the right and the end of your note is to the left.

steps.title: Fold in the top two corners
steps.content: Fold in the top two corners so that they are in the middle. Don't make it too big - you want space at the bottom. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The bottom edge should meet the edge of the triangle you made.
steps.content: The bottom edge should meet the edge of the triangle you made.

steps.title: It should look somewhat like a newspaper hat now.
steps.content: It should look somewhat like a newspaper hat now.

steps.title: Fold the bottom corner of the triangle into the middle.
steps.content: Fold the bottom corner of the triangle into the middle.

steps.title: Fold this one a little farther so that you can tuck it underneath other side.
steps.content: Fold this one a little farther so that you can tuck it underneath other side. [3] X Research source

steps.title: To make sure it stays down, attach a small piece of tape or a sticker to it.
steps.content: To make sure it stays down, attach a small piece of tape or a sticker to it. You can also use a paper clip to hold it down. Or, make sure enough of the "wings" overlap so that you can tuck one of them into the other and they'll stay that way, too. [4] X Research source You're done! Give it to whomever you wrote the note to! (and make sure you teach them how to do it, so they can make one for you)
